scripts.ngcc: ngcc --properties es2020 browser module main --async false --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points
scripts.all:lint: npm run helper:lint; npm run translate:lint; npm run table:bs:lint; npm run table:bs:demo:lint
scripts.all:build: npm run helper:build; npm run translate:build; npm run table:bs:build; npm run table:bs:demo:build
scripts.helper:build: rm -rf ./dist/dfx-helper/ && mkdir -p ./dist/dfx-helper && ng build dfx-helper --configuration production && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/dfx-helper/
scripts.helper:version:patch: npm run helper:build && cd ./projects/dfx-helper && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as patch && cd -
scripts.helper:version:minor: npm run helper:build && cd ./projects/dfx-helper && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as minor && cd -
scripts.helper:version:major: npm run helper:build && cd ./projects/dfx-helper && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as major && cd -
scripts.translate:build: rm -rf ./dist/dfx-translate/ && mkdir -p ./dist/dfx-translate && ng build dfx-translate --configuration production && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/dfx-translate/
scripts.translate:version:patch: npm run translate:build && cd ./projects/dfx-translate && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as patch && cd -
scripts.translate:version:minor: npm run translate:build && cd ./projects/dfx-translate && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as minor && cd -
scripts.translate:version:major: npm run translate:build && cd ./projects/dfx-translate && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as major && cd -
scripts.table:bs:demo:serve: npm run table:bs:build && ng serve dfx-bootstrap-table-demo --hmr
scripts.table:bs:demo:build: npm run table:bs:build && ng build dfx-bootstrap-table-demo --configuration production
scripts.table:bs:build: rm -rf ./dist/dfx-bootstrap-table/ && mkdir -p ./dist/dfx-bootstrap-table && ng build dfx-bootstrap-table --configuration production && cp ./LICENSE ./dist/dfx-bootstrap-table/
scripts.table:bs:version:patch: npm run table:bs:build && cd ./projects/dfx-bootstrap-table && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as patch && cd -
scripts.table:bs:version:minor: npm run table:bs:build && cd ./projects/dfx-bootstrap-table && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as minor && cd -
scripts.table:bs:version:major: npm run table:bs:build && cd ./projects/dfx-bootstrap-table && standard-version --skip.tag --path './' --release-as major && cd -
